item.title: Reflections - Edge firewall
item.description: Edge router and firewall. Currently on the edge I run Ubiquiti’s EdgeRouter 4.

item.title: Reflections - Internet
item.description: Internet connectivity – 1 Gbit/s have must one. In our current apartment the options are somewhat limited, most of the carriers offer just VDSL (or 4G/5G) over the leftover copper but luckily there’s DOCSIS 3.

item.title: Reflections - Wired networking
item.description: Networking – let’s think about boring cables first. People tend to focus on wireless access but what one really should be doing is to make sure that if there are wires around, anything possible should be connected with wires.
